New_Rochelle.Harrison (Metro-North station): The Harrison Metro-North Railroad station serves Harrison, New York via the New Haven Line. During peak hours, some local trains (namely those not subsidized by the Connecticut Department of Transportation) originate or terminate here as opposed to locals from Stamford. Harrison is 22.2 miles (35.7 km) from Grand Central Terminal and the average travel time from Grand Central is 46 minutes.
